name: Flower Adventure
description:
How To Player:

You go up to infinite, and the higher you go, the higher the score.

Collect the largest possible score and compete with your friends

Keys and Controller

a ,d to move ,  z ,w to climp and space to jump 

left arrow , right arrow to move , up arrow ,  down arrow to climp and space to sump

How to climp:

if u want climp just collision with rope and press z,w,up arrow or down arrow
